requests.name: Refund a Captured Payment
requests.description:
Fully or partially refund a captured payment.

Ref: https://developer.paypal.com/webapps/developer/docs/api/#refund-a-captured-payment
requests.headers:
Accept: application/json
Accept-Language: en_US
Content-Type: application/json
Authorization: Bearer {{access_token}}

requests.name: Look up a Captured Payment
requests.description:
Retrieve information about a captured payment.

Ref: https://developer.paypal.com/webapps/developer/docs/api/#look-up-a-captured-payment
requests.headers:
Accept: application/json
Accept-Language: en_US
Content-Type: application/json
Authorization: Bearer {{access_token}}
